document_api_meta.title: Get Affiliate Campaign Creator Fulfillment Status Info
document_api_meta.env_desc: This API offers the ability to get the product fulfillment status for creators who added partner campaign products to their showcase

request_header_param.name: x-tts-access-token
request_header_param.desc: The partner access_token value from [Get Access Token](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a3292b0f40314a92d75#Get%20Access%20Token%20API), when user_type = 3. Follow this [guide](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a3978f4c20311b8b555) to get partner access_token.

request_query_param.name: app_key
request_query_param.desc: Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.

request_query_param.name: sign
request_query_param.desc: Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders.

request_query_param.name: timestamp
request_query_param.desc: Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.

request_query_param.name: page_size
request_query_param.desc: The number of results to be returned per page. Valid range: 1-50.

request_query_param.name: page_token
request_query_param.desc: An opaque token used to retrieve the next page of a paginated result set. Retrieve this value from the result of the `next_page_token` from a previous response. It is not needed for the first page.

request_query_param.name: category_asset_cipher
request_query_param.desc: The partner identifier used in API requests. Retrieve this value by using the [Get Authorized Category Assets API](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/666012dd609d4402cc3be995).

response_param.name: code
response_param.desc: The success or failure status code returned in API response.

response_param.name: message
response_param.desc: The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.

response_param.name: request_id
response_param.desc: Request log

response_param.name: data
response_param.desc: Specific return information

response_param.name: ^total_creator_count
response_param.desc: The total number of creators involved in the campaign.

response_param.name: ^promotion_creators
response_param.desc: A list of objects representing information about the Affiliate Creator associated with the product promotion.

response_param.name: ^^paid_amount
response_param.desc: An object representing the total amount paid for this product.

response_param.name: ^^^currency
response_param.desc: The currency code for the amount field.

response_param.name: ^^^amount
response_param.desc: The total amount paid for this product.

response_param.name: ^^room_count
response_param.desc: The number of live broadcast rooms associated with this promotion.

response_param.name: ^^video_count
response_param.desc: The total number of videos associated with this promotion published by creators.

response_param.name: ^^free_sample_status
response_param.desc:
Status of the Creator's sample application.
- NOT_REQUESTED
- PENDING
- AWAITING_SHIPMENT
- AWAITING_COLLECTION
- SHIPPED
- CONTENT_PENDING
- REJECT_CANCELLED
- OVERDUE_CANCELLED
- UNFULFIL_CANCELLED
- DEL_PLAN_CANCELLED
- SELLER_NOT_SHIP_CANCELLED
- WITHDRAW_CANCELLED
- UNFULFILLABLE_CANCELLED
- OPERATOR_MANUAL_CANCELLED
- OPERATOR_MANUAL_FAILED
- OPERATOR_MANUAL_COMPLETED
- COMPLETED

response_param.name: ^^commission
response_param.desc: The commission rate in hundredths of a percent (0.01%). For example, a value of 1000 is 10.00%.

response_param.name: ^^effective_end_time
response_param.desc: The effective end time for the collaboration in Unix epoch time format.

response_param.name: ^^effective_start_time
response_param.desc: The effective start time for the collaboration in Unix epoch time format.

response_param.name: ^^creator
response_param.desc: An object representing information about the creator associated with the promotion.

response_param.name: ^^^nick_name
response_param.desc: The TikTok nickname of the creator.

response_param.name: ^^^avatar_url
response_param.desc: A URL for the creator's avatar image in the TikTok CDN.

response_param.name: ^^^follower_num
response_param.desc: The total count of TikTok followers for the creator.

response_param.name: ^^^user_name
response_param.desc: user name

response_param.name: ^^^creator_open_id
response_param.desc: Creator Open ID. More details:https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/3obfokj6

response_param.name: ^^affiliate_product_id
response_param.desc: The affiliate product identifier.

response_param.name: ^next_page_token
response_param.desc: Querying next page need this token.

error_code_list.msg: Internal error. Please try again. If the issue persists after multiple attempts, please contact platform support.

sample_code.label: Go
Node.js
Java

scope_list.package_description: The application will be able to access a TikTok Shop Affiliate Partner (TAP) campaign information, including view campaign list and details and campaign product list and details.
scope_list.auth_info: The application will be able to access your TikTok Shop Affiliate Partner (TAP) campaign information, including your contact information, campaign list and details, and campaign product list and details.
